adversarial_findings.summary: Primary validator provenance stale/inconsistent between canonical and latest root report; governance timestamp drift remains.
adversarial_findings.risk: Governance may rely on stale validator evidence instead of final byte state.
adversarial_findings.required_action: Re-run validator as final step, promote exact report to canonical, and regenerate manifest/gate/index on same final state.

adversarial_findings.summary: Uncertain-label quarantine semantics are inconsistent across batch/reasoning/queue artifacts.
adversarial_findings.risk: Uncertain rows can leak into training via non-canonical consumer path assumptions.
adversarial_findings.required_action: Make quarantine single-source-of-truth and align all artifacts for each row.

adversarial_findings.summary: Remediation narrative was ahead of evidence; round3 artifact publication and status alignment required.
adversarial_findings.risk: Ambiguous closure signals in governance review.
adversarial_findings.required_action: Update defects/gate/blocker narrative to explicitly state round3 fail and pending round4 verification.
